name: Topbar
description: Customise the Notion interface's topbar and add an always on top toggle to the window in-app.

options.description: Configures how the share button in the Notion topbar is displayed.
Replaces the icon used for the share button with the uploaded .svg image.
Configures how the comments button in the Notion topbar is displayed.
Replaces the icon used for the comments button with the uploaded .svg image.
Configures how the updates button in the Notion topbar is displayed.
Replaces the icon used for the updates button with the uploaded .svg image.
Configures how the favorite button in the Notion topbar is displayed.
Replaces the icon used for the favorite button with the uploaded .svg image.
Adds a button to the topbar that can be used to pin the Notion window above all other windows regardless of which window currently has focus.
Replaces the icon used for the always on top pin button with the uploaded .svg image.
Replaces the icon used for the always on top unpin button with the uploaded .svg image.

This button activates an additional sidebar on the right-hand side of the screen and will appear in the topbar only if an extension is enabled that displays information through this panel (e.g. the Outliner).
Replaces the icon used for the panel button with the uploaded .svg image.
Configures how the more button in the Notion topbar is displayed.
Replaces the icon used for the more button with the uploaded .svg image.
